DOC.brief_summary: This study is intended to collect safety and effectiveness data on the Cook Injectable Small Intestinal Submucosa (SIS)
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Safety Study of Injectable SIS for Critical Limb Ischemia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of critical limb ischemia Rutherford 45 or LericheFontaine IIIB Patient unable to be treated by endovascular or surgical means Patient's age is <21 Patient is pregnant or breastfeeding (or is planning to become pregnant within the next year) Patient has had a previous surgery, within 30 days of the study procedure Patient has any planned surgical or interventional procedure within 30 days after the study procedure Patient has a life expectancy less than 1 year Patient has a known allergy to pigs or pig products, or has a religious or cultural objection to the use of pig tissue Additional restrictions as specified in the Clinical Investigation Plan
